context_bundle.summary: Timezone handling (UTC offset calc, DST detection), business day calculations (exclude weekends + holidays), fiscal year/quarter logic, age calculation (days/365.25 for leap years)

onboarding.quick_start: Business days: Loop date range, skip Sat/Sun (dddd format check) and holiday list. Timezone: Get UTC, Add/Subtract offset hours. Age: (Today-Birth)/365.25 truncated
common_patterns: Weekday check: Convert DateTime to Text format:dddd -> check <> Saturday AND <> Sunday
Business days loop: If weekday AND not in HolidayList -> count++
Add N business days: Loop adding 1 day, only increment counter on weekdays
Fiscal year (Apr start): If month >= 4 then FY=year else FY=year-1
DST check (US): month 3-10 = DST active, adjust offset
known_errors: DST changes timezone offset - EST=-5 vs EDT=-4
Leap year: use 365.25 divisor for accurate age/duration
Date comparison fails if comparing DateTime to Text - convert first
